idea-plugin.name: Code Remark
idea-plugin.description:
The source code is a read-only file, how to add remarks?
  1. enter the source file to be read.
  2. wherever needed, press the Alt + Enter shortcut key (Or through the right-click menu Code Remark ).
  3. select [MARK] Add remark, enter the remarks, and press the Esc button to save.
  4. For lines that already have remarks, you can still press the shortcut key Alt + Enter to select the corresponding option to edit or delete.
  5. In addition, you can configure the display color of code remarks through Preferences-Other Settings-Code Remark.
  6. You can also search for Code Remark through Preferences-Keymap and configure the corresponding shortcut keys for the specified operation.


源码是只读文件，如何添加备注？
  1. 进入需要阅读的源码文件。
  2. 在任何需要的地方，按下 Alt + Enter 快捷键（或通过右键菜单 Code Remark )。
  3. 选择 [MARK] Add remark，输入备注信息，按下 Esc 按钮保存即可。
  4. 已经有备注的行，你依然可以继续按下 Alt + Enter 快捷键，选择对应的选项，进行编辑或者删除。
  5. 此外，你可以通过 Preferences - Other Settings - Code Remark 配置代码备注的显示颜色。
  6. 你还可以通过 Preferences - Keymap 搜索 Code Remark ，为指定的操作配置相应的快捷键。
